dict.acceptation: 特征，特点；容貌，面貌；（期刊的）特辑；故事片；
使有特色；描写…的特征；以…为号召物；
起主要作用；作重要角色；

sent.orig: The presentations of shape feature, material feature, accuracy feature and management feature are researched and fulfilled.
sent.trans: 研究并且实现了形状特征、材料特征、精度特征和管理特征的描述。

sent.orig: Intellective resource has his to form feature, existence feature, use feature and evaluation feature.
sent.trans: 智力资源有其形成特征、存在特征、使用特征和评价特征。

sent.orig: Feature recognition and feature example are core of feature modeling.
sent.trans: 特征识别和特征实例化是特征造型的核心。

sent.orig: Datum Feature A datum feature is a feature used to a datum.
sent.trans: 基准形体或基准特徵–是用来建立基准的形体或特徵。

sent.orig: First, we discuss on the key of feature-based registration methods: feature extraction and feature matching.
sent.trans: 本文首先讨论了基于特征的图像配准方法中的关键步骤：特征提取和特征匹配。
